Managing InstancesÂ¶

Instances can be retrieved, added, edited, removed and so on.

Here we list the available services for managing them.

  • Create a Instance
    • Optional query string parameters
    • Possible responses
  • List of Instances
    • Optional parameters
    • Possible responses
  • Get an Instance
    • Optional parameters
    • Possible responses
  • Delete a Instance
    • Optional parameters
    • Possible responses
  • Edit a Instance
    • Optional query string parameters
    • Possible responses
